name: .EPGZ
summary: Learn about .EPGZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open EPGZ files with Evolus Pencil in Windows, macOS, and Linux. To open an EPGZ file with Pencil, click the menu in the upper-left corner of the application and select Open....

images.alt: Screenshot of a .epgz file in Evolus Pencil 3.1
images.caption: EPGZ file open in Evolus Pencil 3.1
